mails.Subject: Connect TikTok to Hootsuite with Pendulum
mails.Body:
To view this email as a web page, go to the following address: https://socialbusiness.hootsuite.com/index.php/email/emailWebview?mkt_tok=NDA3LU9ZWi00ODIAAAGADZM_bVXqDoINB1Ipa0c72UwmC1cF4Qt2_H_yt65g567D--gNx3T6esYAWEYQFk6uCDfwsmKTZGpv2KlLXqYa172r3QbGFDkrpOBk663rI_lQkVso&md_id=80279

Here’s how we can help.
Discover the latest Hootsuite product releases and features—and get a sneak peek at what’s coming soon.
New stuff coming your way in October
This month we’re releasing new Twitter performance data and report organization <https://emails.hootsuite.com/NDA3LU9ZWi00ODIAAAGADZM_bXtUpjz5d2RIwYOHLzuz4PUw948qIx1tvuW8d2hNyrFmevyv7BMEhmLIQ7l621Y-KFU=> in Hootsuite Analytics, and performance benchmarking and post-level metrics in Hootsuite Insights.

That’s not all! We’re also introducing the highly anticipated Pendulum app for TikTok <https://emails.hootsuite.com/NDA3LU9ZWi00ODIAAAGADZM_bR_WBoxC0aDxiEFDAvmIAIx66S3rL7Cpjb8zuihMP9CsbOEDsk8toNYWkSCblo3cz9Q=> and LinkedIn video publishing <https://emails.hootsuite.com/NDA3LU9ZWi00ODIAAAGADZM_bSblHgKVIcQfKw4Ff6fkE44rTRyZotphm6J927JAJnTpkBlfEe3txlq3pKNpMBJ2Eb4=>.

Check out the video for more.
Watch Now <https://emails.hootsuite.com/NDA3LU9ZWi00ODIAAAGADZM_bYq44_4-jfG17jgrVL1gmck4MdN8koDBZJ4ZOGA3KqygNiChRTTUMe4O-CTFyfy0RwY=>
New Twitter performance data in Analytics
Track Twitter impressions and engagement data in Hootsuite Analytics and gain the insights you need to optimize your posts.

Note: Available with Professional plan and above.
See the Metrics <https://emails.hootsuite.com/NDA3LU9ZWi00ODIAAAGADZM_bXtUpjz5d2RIwYOHLzuz4PUw948qIx1tvuW8d2hNyrFmevyv7BMEhmLIQ7l621Y-KFU=>
Meet Pendulum, our new TikTok app!
View your TikTok videos in-stream and share or schedule them to your social networks—including multiple TikTok accounts—with video thumbnail images.
Get the App <https://emails.hootsuite.com/NDA3LU9ZWi00ODIAAAGADZM_bR_WBoxC0aDxiEFDAvmIAIx66S3rL7Cpjb8zuihMP9CsbOEDsk8toNYWkSCblo3cz9Q=>
Publish videos to personal LinkedIn profiles
Create, schedule, engage, amplify, and measure your LinkedIn video posts alongside all your other content.
Try it Now <https://emails.hootsuite.com/NDA3LU9ZWi00ODIAAAGADZM_bSblHgKVIcQfKw4Ff6fkE44rTRyZotphm6J927JAJnTpkBlfEe3txlq3pKNpMBJ2Eb4=>
New Analytics experience
Pin and organize your reports like never before in Hootsuite Analytics. We’ve also added additional metrics context in the tooltips for richer insights about your data calculations.

Note: Available with Professional plan and above.
See More <https://emails.hootsuite.com/NDA3LU9ZWi00ODIAAAGADZM_bUS-ocpQwqPfuLUlEu7tjMsFGvOhzKwV3cVPCf2NIUZQL51MY09w4y2f3eSRg_vXftM=>
Want to get more from Hootsuite? Speak to our experts <https://emails.hootsuite.com/NDA3LU9ZWi00ODIAAAGADZM_bfG6HGtrbkiZI9lzeU9G0pEzi_q2nlwJ-vosLlJIaIVP1gz3cxEhBBr5qHsdECh39gU=> and we’ll help you access new social territory.


This email was sent to cdo@bonetakers-trier.de.
Visit the email management center to manage your subscription https://www.hootsuite.com/preference-center, or you can unsubscribe at any time https://www.hootsuite.com/unsubscribe

mails.Subject: Fehler beim Senden der vorausgeplanten Nachricht
mails.Body:
Plus all the latest Hootsuite product releases coming your way
To view this email as a web page, click here

Here’s how we can help.

Discover the latest Hootsuite product releases and features—and get a sneak peek at what’s coming soon.


New stuff coming your way in October

This month we’re releasing new Twitter performance data and report organization in Hootsuite Analytics, and performance benchmarking and post-level metrics in Hootsuite Insights.

That’s not all! We’re also introducing the highly anticipated Pendulum app for TikTok and LinkedIn video publishing.

Check out the video for more.
Watch Now

New Twitter performance data in Analytics

Track Twitter impressions and engagement data in Hootsuite Analytics and gain the insights you need to optimize your posts.

Note: Available with Professional plan and above.
See the Metrics

Meet Pendulum, our new TikTok app!

View your TikTok videos in-stream and share or schedule them to your social networks—including multiple TikTok accounts—with video thumbnail images.
Get the App

Publish videos to personal LinkedIn profiles

Create, schedule, engage, amplify, and measure your LinkedIn video posts alongside all your other content.
Try it Now

New Analytics experience

Pin and organize your reports like never before in Hootsuite Analytics. We’ve also added additional metrics context in the tooltips for richer insights about your data calculations.

Note: Available with Professional plan and above.
See More
Want to get more from Hootsuite? Speak to our experts and we’ll help you access new social territory.
Speak to an expert

Hootsuite Inc. 111 E 5th Ave, 3rd Floor, Vancouver, BC, V5T 4L1
This email was sent to cdo@bonetakers-trier.de because you are a Hootsuite user
or submitted an inquiry to Hootsuite. To update your email subscription, please visit our
email preference center, or you can unsubscribe at any time. View our privacy policy.

mails.Subject: Webinar: Conversational Experience: Eine neue Ära des Social-Media-Kundenservice?
mails.Body:
Darum sollte Kundenservice zentraler Bestandteil Ihrer Marketingstrategie sein.
<https://emails.hootsuite.com/dc/mj-YhWAsdnWVQeZhWmBPTm-LWva7QdJCAMlTJQH8aMXXyTlxdq50Ue3iDYeXmUtXXgae4Ej6EdfdlauoKguI0K_9PEmkdE4-ypC4hF62Q1i8Efr1jtuOSxXiVQxh96de09B94RXjHjkL07lfmIHPDNTykiQRQ_8nLueUz8DwK5BBFknFqlx0w9I5OC4xAgBnlShc3VEkNT3ZyRgt3vkY36om0kewB5makHpqCeZDoqFrFYqH0ERwC0Kc5karjFYUoIkpi40BRDgp9egF3xgrtSxIO9Fh_O17wIKHvvSEGcpI8jeL8aGDUjIZQ7aN9Piq/NDA3LU9ZWi00ODIAAAF_ppHfvYEP5Z1s9wsGhgNB2-phlUc-eTwZzf0F49qEu2nq6bUEobcLraK3UIqtDMnvDudseBM=>
Wednesday, Sep 22, 2021 | 10 am CEST
In der heutigen digitalen Welt ist es entscheidend, mit Ihren Kunden auf Plattformen in Kontakt zu bleiben, mit denen sie bereits vertraut sind und die sie am liebsten nutzen: Social Media, Messaging-Apps und SMS.

Verpassen Sie nicht die Tipps unserer Experten, die Ihnen helfen, sich in der sich schnell verändernden Welt des Online-Kundenservice zurechtzufinden, und lernen Sie, worauf es beim Aufbau starker und dauerhafter Beziehungen zu Ihrem Publikum ankommt!

Nehmen Sie am 22. September um 10.00 Uhr CEST an unserem Webinar “Conversational Experience: Eine neue Ära des Social-Media-Kundenservice” teil. Erfahren Sie, wie Sie über Social-Media-Plattformen und Messaging-Apps richtig mit Ihrem Publikum interagieren, einen Mehrwert schaffen und Kundenzufriedenheit und -treue aufbauen!
Jetzt registrieren <https://emails.hootsuite.com/dc/mj-YhWAsdnWVQeZhWmBPTm-LWva7QdJCAMlTJQH8aMXXyTlxdq50Ue3iDYeXmUtXXgae4Ej6EdfdlauoKguI0K_9PEmkdE4-ypC4hF62Q1i8Efr1jtuOSxXiVQxh96de09B94RXjHjkL07lfmIHPDNTykiQRQ_8nLueUz8DwK5BBFknFqlx0w9I5OC4xAgBnlShc3VEkNT3ZyRgt3vkY36om0kewB5makHpqCeZDoqFrFYqH0ERwC0Kc5karjFYUoIkpi40BRDgp9egF3xgrtSxIO9Fh_O17wIKHvvSEGcpI8jeL8aGDUjIZQ7aN9Piq/NDA3LU9ZWi00ODIAAAF_ppHfvYEP5Z1s9wsGhgNB2-phlUc-eTwZzf0F49qEu2nq6bUEobcLraK3UIqtDMnvDudseBM=>
In diesem Webinar behandeln wir:

• Der neue Social-Media-Nutzer – Was sie wollen, welche sozialen und Messaging-Kanäle sie lieben und welche Anforderungen sie haben.

• Kundenansprüchen online gerecht werden – Was ist eine Conversational Experience (Konversationsmarketing) und was für positive Effekte hat sie auf Ihre Kundenbeziehungen?

• Die Wertschöpfungskette von Social Media – Wie können Sie bei jedem Schritt der Customer Journey authentische Verbindungen zu Ihren Kunden herstellen?

• Beispiele aus der Praxis – Wie sich alles in einem detaillierten Use Case abspielt.
Keine Zeit am 22. September um 10.00 Uhr CEST? Registrieren Sie sich jetzt <https://emails.hootsuite.com/dc/mj-YhWAsdnWVQeZhWmBPTm-LWva7QdJCAMlTJQH8aMXXyTlxdq50Ue3iDYeXmUtXXgae4Ej6EdfdlauoKguI0K_9PEmkdE4-ypC4hF62Q1i8Efr1jtuOSxXiVQxh96de09B94RXjHjkL07lfmIHPDNTykiQRQ_8nLueUz8DwK5BBFknFqlx0w9I5OC4xAgBnlShc3VEkNT3ZyRgt3vkY36om0kewB5makHpqCeZDoqFrFYqH0ERwC0Kc5karjFYUoIkpi40BRDgp9egF3xgrtSxIO9Fh_O17wIKHvvSEGcpI8jeL8aGDUjIZQ7aN9Piq/NDA3LU9ZWi00ODIAAAF_ppHfvYEP5Z1s9wsGhgNB2-phlUc-eTwZzf0F49qEu2nq6bUEobcLraK3UIqtDMnvDudseBM=> – wir schicken Ihnen einen Link zur Aufzeichnung, sobald diese verfügbar ist.
Wednesday, Sep 22, 2021
10 am CEST
Jetzt anmelden <https://emails.hootsuite.com/dc/mj-YhWAsdnWVQeZhWmBPTm-LWva7QdJCAMlTJQH8aMXXyTlxdq50Ue3iDYeXmUtXXgae4Ej6EdfdlauoKguI0K_9PEmkdE4-ypC4hF62Q1i8Efr1jtuOSxXiVQxh96de09B94RXjHjkL07lfmIHPDNTykiQRQ_8nLueUz8DwK5BBFknFqlx0w9I5OC4xAgBnlShc3VEkNT3ZyRgt3vkY36om0kewB5makHpqCeZDoqFrFYqH0ERwC0Kc5karjFYUoIkpi40BRDgp9egF3xgrtSxIO9Fh_O17wIKHvvSEGcpI8jeL8aGDUjIZQ7aN9Piq/NDA3LU9ZWi00ODIAAAF_ppHfvYEP5Z1s9wsGhgNB2-phlUc-eTwZzf0F49qEu2nq6bUEobcLraK3UIqtDMnvDudseBM=>

mails.Subject: Webinar: Was kann Social-Media-Kundenservice für Ihre Marke erreichen?
mails.Body:
To view this email as a web page, go to the following address: https://socialbusiness.hootsuite.com/index.php/email/emailWebview?mkt_tok=NDA3LU9ZWi00ODIAAAF_h6tzL0R1wJXm_pNntetwxqD_G3KHip2D6uoE8I0CcyeEa5my_nP3xN8D9sieDcuc2IsoUqmffxtjypHW79qBdbNWz6ZquZFdswOC8s-5jACI2E6l&md_id=79411

Darum sollte Kundenservice zentraler Bestandteil Ihrer Marketingstrategie sein.
<https://emails.hootsuite.com/dc/mj-YhWAsdnWVQeZhWmBPTm-LWva7QdJCAMlTJQH8aMXXyTlxdq50Ue3iDYeXmUtXXgae4Ej6EdfdlauoKguI0MOiQjUwvDFGxa_HDwikygdrPrscp06GyabK1tFg2JzyDIpgx82GKVbPJORD_UXnsv28HqkARqoqA1gVZdn-BQ8k9kqEvgJLik2iRfk1UhNZDILpE5Sftrkkhg0IzExZZ1vN3Drvf4fwEdTkjL1A_SYmhAsN-EaHL2WaqkV0_MGCDXxyzDoQeDYNEXk45VazilM3p0ZzOLqppIcqHrOjwgXYO1zCihy_TfSh_AxnBHIe/NDA3LU9ZWi00ODIAAAF_h6tzL_JsDj7v44vm4QJUatkPBmi0q6_Dz8A7BqYPZG87Rg5eKX4UrgZUnC2QftEHZfrsHvI=>
Im Jahr 2021 leben wir in einer zunehmend digitalen Welt. Die Menschen wollen mit Marken und Unternehmen über die Plattformen in Kontakt treten, mit denen sie bereits vertraut sind und die sie am liebsten nutzen: Social Media, Messaging-Apps und SMS.

Ihre Marke muss für Ihre Kunden da sein, wenn es drauf ankommt, und sie bei jedem Schritt ihrer Customer Journey begleiten. Durch den ständigen Dialog mit Ihrem Publikum bleiben diese nicht nur mit Ihrer Marke verbunden, sondern haben auch das Gefühl, gehört und geschätzt zu werden.

Aus diesem Grund muss erstklassiger Kundenservice ein zentraler Bestandteil Ihrer Marketingstrategie sein. So können Sie für Ihre Kunden positive Erfahrungen ermöglichen, die dauerhafte Verbindungen aufbauen.

Seien Sie am 22. September um 10.00 Uhr MESZ bei unserem Webinar “Conversational Experience: Eine neue Ära des Social-Media-Kundenservice” dabei. Wir stellen Ihnen Tools und Strategien vor, die Ihrem Unternehmen dabei helfen, dank Social-Media-Kundenservice mit Kunden in Kontakt zu bleiben, Mehrwert zu schaffen und die Kundenzufriedenheit und -treue zu steigern.
Jetzt registrieren <https://emails.hootsuite.com/dc/mj-YhWAsdnWVQeZhWmBPTm-LWva7QdJCAMlTJQH8aMXXyTlxdq50Ue3iDYeXmUtXXgae4Ej6EdfdlauoKguI0MOiQjUwvDFGxa_HDwikygdrPrscp06GyabK1tFg2JzyDIpgx82GKVbPJORD_UXnsv28HqkARqoqA1gVZdn-BQ8k9kqEvgJLik2iRfk1UhNZDILpE5Sftrkkhg0IzExZZ1vN3Drvf4fwEdTkjL1A_SYmhAsN-EaHL2WaqkV0_MGCDXxyzDoQeDYNEXk45VazilM3p0ZzOLqppIcqHrOjwgXYO1zCihy_TfSh_AxnBHIe/NDA3LU9ZWi00ODIAAAF_h6tzL_JsDj7v44vm4QJUatkPBmi0q6_Dz8A7BqYPZG87Rg5eKX4UrgZUnC2QftEHZfrsHvI=>
In diesem Webinar behandeln wir:
 
• Der neue Social-Media-Nutzer – Was sie wollen, welche Social-Media- und Messaging-Kanäle sie lieben und welche Anforderungen sie haben. 
• Kundenansprüchen online gerecht werden – Was ist eine Conversational Experience (Konversationserlebnis) und welche positiven Effekte hat sie auf Ihre Kundenbeziehungen? 
• Die Wertschöpfungskette von Social Media – Wie können Sie bei jedem Schritt des Kaufprozesses authentische Verbindungen zu Ihren Kunden herstellen? 
• Praktische Beispiele – Wie sich die Umsetzung in einem detaillierten Fallbeispiel darstellt.
Keine Zeit am 22. September um 10.00 Uhr CEST? Registrieren Sie sich jetzt <https://emails.hootsuite.com/dc/mj-YhWAsdnWVQeZhWmBPTm-LWva7QdJCAMlTJQH8aMXXyTlxdq50Ue3iDYeXmUtXXgae4Ej6EdfdlauoKguI0MOiQjUwvDFGxa_HDwikygdrPrscp06GyabK1tFg2JzyDIpgx82GKVbPJORD_UXnsv28HqkARqoqA1gVZdn-BQ8k9kqEvgJLik2iRfk1UhNZDILpE5Sftrkkhg0IzExZZ1vN3Drvf4fwEdTkjL1A_SYmhAsN-EaHL2WaqkV0_MGCDXxyzDoQeDYNEXk45VazilM3p0ZzOLqppIcqHrOjwgXYO1zCihy_TfSh_AxnBHIe/NDA3LU9ZWi00ODIAAAF_h6tzL_JsDj7v44vm4QJUatkPBmi0q6_Dz8A7BqYPZG87Rg5eKX4UrgZUnC2QftEHZfrsHvI=> – wir schicken Ihnen einen Link zur Aufzeichnung, sobald diese verfügbar ist.
Wednesday, Sep 22, 2021
10 am CEST
Jetzt anmelden <https://emails.hootsuite.com/dc/mj-YhWAsdnWVQeZhWmBPTm-LWva7QdJCAMlTJQH8aMXXyTlxdq50Ue3iDYeXmUtXXgae4Ej6EdfdlauoKguI0MOiQjUwvDFGxa_HDwikygdrPrscp06GyabK1tFg2JzyDIpgx82GKVbPJORD_UXnsv28HqkARqoqA1gVZdn-BQ8k9kqEvgJLik2iRfk1UhNZDILpE5Sftrkkhg0IzExZZ1vN3Drvf4fwEdTkjL1A_SYmhAsN-EaHL2WaqkV0_MGCDXxyzDoQeDYNEXk45VazilM3p0ZzOLqppIcqHrOjwgXYO1zCihy_TfSh_AxnBHIe/NDA3LU9ZWi00ODIAAAF_h6tzL_JsDj7v44vm4QJUatkPBmi0q6_Dz8A7BqYPZG87Rg5eKX4UrgZUnC2QftEHZfrsHvI=>

mails.Subject: New to Hootsuite! Dark mode, best time to publish & more
mails.Body:
To view this email as a web page, go to the following address: https://socialbusiness.hootsuite.com/index.php/email/emailWebview?mkt_tok=NDA3LU9ZWi00ODIAAAF_Xn0IokAGSKRIkTLxADWhJM_LIRFY3RQztwe_Qks9mojtgrYk4APdE37DSsxbUPb5TUiI0AwP_yuYyISrSvJEBMb4f9QT_5niw3I6lwYXbA7twQQ2&md_id=79212

Here’s how we can help.
Discover the latest Hootsuite product releases and features—and get a sneak peek at what’s coming soon.
New in Hootsuite
Last month, we took the guesswork out of scheduling with the launch of the ‘Best Time to Post’ feature in Planner. Now we’re excited to announce it’s also live in Composer! 

That’s not all. Use the post status filter in Planner to quickly review content, and give your eyes a rest with Dark Mode—available to choose in the Hootsuite app.

Watch the video to get up to speed on everything that’s new this month.
Watch Now <https://emails.hootsuite.com/NDA3LU9ZWi00ODIAAAF_Xn0IompGPlnh7ZyBThARH6fDCxNidGL_cuNCg5EdmME9GCmVOD4DzhEflql7y5jSSwCwYLU=>
Best time to publish in Composer
Want the confidence to know you’re scheduling posts to reach your audience at optimal times? Look out for recommendations tailored to each of your social accounts, now available in Composer.

Note: Available with Professional plan and above.
Learn More <https://emails.hootsuite.com/NDA3LU9ZWi00ODIAAAF_Xn0IovKfP2PZvXcmQW51QUhHdmpjRanzydpgdQyhrezExVw2PVFrBjR03uXbnl9mWfYZb0U=>
Filter by type of post in Planner
Reviewing a calendar filled to the rafters with social content can be tough. Simplify the process with the option to filter the Planner by post status, including Scheduled, Pending Approval, Drafts, Failed, and more.
Take a Look <https://emails.hootsuite.com/NDA3LU9ZWi00ODIAAAF_Xn0Iogr5qt7-k2-mc6zenKAOjHnC-sbotZ9WWkI-218osxhoD-50FPR_1do2HjDNY1sZLMQ=>
Instagram Messaging in Hootsuite Inbox
Manage and respond to your Instagram business account messages and Stories right from your Hootsuite Inbox. This quick, seamless way to engage with your audience increases efficiency, responsiveness, and customer satisfaction. Watch the video for a quick overview. 

Note: Available to Professional plan users and up.
View Instagram Messages in Inbox <https://emails.hootsuite.com/NDA3LU9ZWi00ODIAAAF_Xn0IosTvezsA5OZMWR4slnjP7epnl6Fo5i9kA1eNuA3KghV-0Ev61DmaW9FDm0J1M28v6PE=>
Dark mode on mobile has arrived
Give your eyes a rest in low-light environments by activating dark mode! 

There is now an option to select your preferred theme in the Hootsuite mobile app and, with ‘Dark’ or ‘Light’ modes to choose from, it’s easier than ever to manage social media from anywhere and at any time of day or night.
Try Dark Mode Now <https://emails.hootsuite.com/NDA3LU9ZWi00ODIAAAF_Xn0Iot8VVOWKE4lC3G3Jdh1qIN5k2H-WXjFHAjg6paD7Gn6553gebarOxfOLp9YIQibx-b8=>

This email was sent to cdo@bonetakers-trier.de.
Visit the email management center to manage your subscription https://www.hootsuite.com/preference-center, or you can unsubscribe at any time https://www.hootsuite.com/unsubscribe

mails.Subject: Re: Die E-Mail wurde versendet
mails.Body:
Here’s another exciting round-up of Hootsuite product updates and news
To view this email as a web page, click here

Here’s how we can help.

Discover the latest Hootsuite product releases and features—and get a sneak peek at what’s coming soon.

New in Hootsuite

Last month, we took the guesswork out of scheduling with the launch of the ‘Best Time to Post’ feature in Planner. Now we’re excited to announce it’s also live in Composer!

That’s not all. Use the post status filter in Planner to quickly review content, and give your eyes a rest with Dark Mode—available to choose in the Hootsuite app.

Watch the video to get up to speed on everything that’s new this month.
Watch Now

Best time to publish in Composer

Want the confidence to know you’re scheduling posts to reach your audience at optimal times? Look out for recommendations tailored to each of your social accounts, now available in Composer.

Note: Available with Professional plan and above.
Learn More

Filter by type of post in Planner

Reviewing a calendar filled to the rafters with social content can be tough. Simplify the process with the option to filter the Planner by post status, including Scheduled, Pending Approval, Drafts, Failed, and more.
Take a Look

Instagram Messaging in Hootsuite Inbox

Manage and respond to your Instagram business account messages and Stories right from your Hootsuite Inbox. This quick, seamless way to engage with your audience increases efficiency, responsiveness, and customer satisfaction. Watch the video for a quick overview.

Note: Available to Professional plan users and up.
View Instagram Messages in Inbox

Dark mode on mobile has arrived

Give your eyes a rest in low-light environments by activating dark mode!

There is now an option to select your preferred theme in the Hootsuite mobile app and, with ‘Dark’ or ‘Light’ modes to choose from, it’s easier than ever to manage social media from anywhere and at any time of day or night.
Try Dark Mode Now

Hootsuite Inc. 111 E 5th Ave, 3rd Floor, Vancouver, BC, V5T 4L1

or submitted an inquiry to Hootsuite. To update your email subscription, please visit our
